item.description:
Please come to see Stolen Kisses, a 1968 romantic comedy by Francois Truffaut! It is funny and charming.


Please come down to Real Art Ways!
This is a delightful classic film from 1968. I will lead off with an introduction to the film and its era, as well as guide a discussion afterwards. The film is one of my all-time favorites. It is fully sub-titled for those of you who don’t remember your high school French!
Real Art Ways is at 56 Arbor Street, Hartford, off Capitol Ave.

Stolen Kisses (1968)
By François Truffaut
Monday, August 16
1 PM refreshments- come early!
1:30 PM introduction and screening
Discussion after
$5 for members
$8 for non-members
Jean-Pierre Leaud stars in the third film of Truffaut's character Antoine Doinel . This film tells of Antoine's misadventures with his loves and many odd jobs. It’s a delightful romantic comedy.

group.name: The West Hartford Groupe de French

item.name: French movie matinée
